Home Care & Maintenance
After a qualified home inspection yeilds no serious deficiencies remain, regular routine maintenance of critical systems and parts will add many years of dependable service to your home. This guide illustrates the proper steps you, as the consumer, can periodically take to help assure proper functioning and safety of your home throughout the years.

It is always recommended that qualified technicians perform additional maintenace of mechanical and electrical components.

A well maintained and cared for home is easy to achieve and protects the biggest investment most families will ever make.
Exterior Maintenance Items:
Doors
Windows
Roofing
Erosion
Landscaping
Brick
Stucco
Hard Siding
Cedar Shakes
Concrete
Chimneys
Exterior penetrations
Painting
Decks
Emergency Procedures
Property pins
Venting
Plumbing
Electrical
Foundation Drains
